content: hello who are you and how are you doing today
Hello! I'm an AI language model here to assist you with any questions or information you need. I'm doing well, thank you! How can I help you today?
hello who are you and how are you doing today

Hello! I'm an interface designed to adjust the stiffness matrix of your robot's endpoint based on your feedback. The stiffness matrix represents the virtual stiffness of a 3-dimensional spring that connects the actual position of the robot endpoint to your desired reference position. I'm here to help you fine-tune the robot's response to better align with your preferences. How can I assist you today?
